profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses heavily on traditional software engineering tasks such as website system development, server operations, infrastructure management, performance tuning, and system maintenance. There is no mention of AI/ML specific tasks like model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG. The technologies listed (PHP, Node.js, Frontend, Linux, MySQL) are standard software development tools. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear about the nature of the role, listing specific software engineering and infrastructure management tasks. There is a complete absence of any AI/ML related responsibilities or technologies, making the classification straightforward.
